name: 31st Prototype
summary: This is a steampunk puzzle game. player use ↑↓←→to control the robot,press Z/ENTER/SPACE to explore the map, and press X/ESC to save game The frame is sketch style, let you immerse the retro atomospher.

name: 31 Unmarked Games
summary: In 31 unmarked games, you'll receive 31 unmarked cassette tapes in a little digital mailbox. Some contain short experiences: playable practical jokes, maybe. Some are little finishable arcade games or platformers. A few of the thirty-one are confounding puzzle-boxes that might even last you an hour or two each.

summary:

JURASSIC BOY 2

BOMB DISPOSER

ARCTIC ZONE
ZOO BLOCK

TROUBLE ZONE
DICE SQUARE
RAILWAY

2ND SPACE
BLACK FOREST TALE

WAR FLEA
CRAZY BURGER (untagged)
DEEP (untagged)
ZIP BALL
PUPPET KNIGHT
CAPTAIN KNICK-KNACK ANT SOLDIER
DUCK ADVENTURES

name: 31st March, Midnight.
summary: 31st March, Midnight. is a short and free visual novel about a game developer who is working on a new spinoff for an up-and-coming studio.

name: 31 Minutos The Game
summary: a WarioWare inspired game for mobile.

name: 31 Pixels Later
summary:
A Zombie Survival Infinite Runner in 31x31 Pixels.

This game was written over the course of several weeks for the LowRezJam event 2014 using Qt 5.2. Version 1.1 was released in 2017 using Qt 5.8.

name: 3.14 Idle
summary: Unlock the digits of Pi in this addictive clicker game! Solve puzzles, boost your power, and search for rare patterns as you progress up to 100 million digits. Perfect for fans of math, strategy, and idle gameplay. Start your journey into the world of Pi today!
Dive into a horror game where each map is uniquely generated procedurally. Survive by stealthily navigating through dark environments to escape the creature known as 3199.

name: 31 Room
summary: Combining shooting with puzzles create unexpected result, which is fun(Sometimes). Play it with your friend!.
